text: The men's singles in the luge European championships, was held in 6 January at Königssee. Russia's Semen Pavlichenko won the gold medal. Germany's Ralf Palik finished second and Austria's Wolfgang Kindl won the bronze medal. ==Competition schedule== All times are (UTC+1). {| class=wikitable ! Date !! Time !!
